ai-an2:151.1.1_0: “There are these two kinds of welcome.
ai-an2:151.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by two?
ai-an2:151.1.3_0: Welcome in material things and welcome in the teaching.
ai-an2:151.1.4_0: These are the two kinds of welcome.
ai-an2:151.1.5_0: The better of these two kinds of welcome is the welcome in the teaching.”
ai-an2:152.1.1_0: “There are these two kinds of hospitality.
ai-an2:152.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by two?
ai-an2:152.1.3_0: Welcome in material things and welcome in the teaching.
ai-an2:152.1.4_0: These are the two kinds of hospitality.
ai-an2:152.1.5_0: The better of these two kinds of hospitality is hospitality in the teaching.”
ai-an2:153.1.3_0: The quest for material things and the quest for the teaching.
ai-an2:153.1.5_0: The better of these two searches is the search for the teaching.”
ai-an2:154.1.3_0: The search for material things and the search for the teaching.
ai-an2:154.1.5_0: The better of these two searches is the search for the teaching.”
ai-an2:155.1.1_0: “There are these two kinds of seeking.
ai-an2:155.1.3_0: Seeking for material things and seeking for the teaching.
ai-an2:155.1.4_0: These are the two kinds of seeking.
ai-an2:155.1.5_0: The better of these two kinds of similes is the exposition of the teaching.”
ai-an2:156.1.1_0: “There are these two kinds of worship.
ai-an2:156.1.3_0: Serpent in material things and (the nature of) Dhamma,
ai-an2:156.1.4_0: These are the two kinds of worship.
ai-an2:156.1.5_0: The better of these two kinds of worship is worship of the teaching.”
ai-an2:157.1.1_0: “There are these two ways of serving guests.
ai-an2:157.1.3_0: Serving guests with material things and serving guests with the teaching.
ai-an2:157.1.4_0: These are the two ways of serving guests.
ai-an2:157.1.5_0: The better of these two ways of serving guests is to serve them with the teaching.”
ai-an2:158.1.3_0: Success in material things and success in the teaching.
ai-an2:158.1.5_0: The better of these two successes is successful and prosperous.”
ai-an2:159.1.1_0: “There are these two kinds of growth.
ai-an2:159.1.3_0: Gold and passages in material things,
ai-an2:159.1.4_0: These are the two kinds of growth.
ai-an2:159.1.5_0: The better of these two kinds of growth is growth in the teaching.”
ai-an2:160.1.3_0: The treasure of material things and the treasure of the teaching.
ai-an2:160.1.5_0: The better of these two treasures is the treasure of the teaching.”
ai-an2:161.1.1_0: “There are these two kinds of accumulation.
ai-an2:161.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by two?
ai-an2:161.1.3_0: Accumulation of material things and accumulation of the teaching.
ai-an2:161.1.4_0: These are the two kinds of accumulation.
ai-an2:161.1.5_0: The better of these two kinds of accumulation is the accumulation of the teaching.”
ai-an2:162.1.1_0: “There are, mendicants, these two kinds of increase.
ai-an2:162.1.3_0: Increase in material things and increase in the teaching.
ai-an2:162.1.4_0: These are the two kinds of increase.
ai-an2:162.1.5_0: The better of these two kinds of increase is increase in the teaching.”

ai-an2:190-194.1.1_0: “Anyone who has two things lives in suffering.
ai-an2:190-194.1.4_0: Anyone who has these two things lives in suffering.”
ai-an2:195-199.1.1_0: “Anyone who has these two things lives happily.
ai-an2:195-199.1.4_0: Anyone who has these two things lives happily.”
ai-an2:200-204.1.1_0: “These two things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-an2:200-204.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by two?
ai-an2:200-204.1.4_0: These two things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.”
ai-an2:205-209.1.1_0: “These two things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-an2:205-209.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by two?
ai-an2:205-209.1.4_0: These two things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.”
ai-an2:210-214.1.1_0: “Anyone who has two things is cast down to hell.
ai-an2:210-214.1.4_0: Anyone who has these two things is cast down to hell.”
ai-an2:215-219.1.1_0: “Anyone who has two things is raised up to heaven.
ai-an2:215-219.1.4_0: Anyone who has these two things is raised up to heaven.”
ai-an2:220-224.1.1_0: “When they have two things, some people, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-an2:220-224.1.4_0: When they have two things, some people, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-an2:225-229.1.1_0: “When they have two things, some people, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
ai-an2:225-229.1.4_0: When they have two things, some people, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
ai-an2:225-229.1.5_0: The successive permutation series on anger is finished.
ai-an2:230-279.1.1_5: There are these two things that are happiness.

ai-an2:230-279.1.1_7: There are these two things that bring happiness.
ai-an2:230-279.1.1_8: There are these two things that are hurtful and hurtful.
ai-an2:230-279.1.1_9: These two things are not hurtful.

ai-an2:230-279.1.4_0: These are the two things that are not hurtful.”
ai-an2:230-279.1.5_0: The successive permutation series on the unskillful is finished.
ai-an2:280.1.1_0: “For two reasons the Realized One laid down training rules for his disciples.
ai-an2:280.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by two?
ai-an2:280.1.3_0: for the well-being of the Sangha ...
ai-an2:280.1.3_1: for the restraint of bad people ...
ai-an2:280.1.3_2: protecting against defilements that affect the present life and protecting against defilements that affect lives to come ...
ai-an2:280.1.3_3: leads to enmity, enmity, and ill will.
ai-an2:280.1.3_4: For the fault apparent in the present life, and protecting against lives to come ...
ai-an2:280.1.3_5: For the present life and lives to come ... For restraining threats to lives to come ...
ai-an2:280.1.3_6: For the restraint of unskillful qualities in this life and in lives to come ...
ai-an2:280.1.3_7: for householders to have wicked desires,
ai-an2:280.1.3_9: for the longevity of the true Teaching, and for supporting the training.
ai-an2:280.1.4_0: These two reasons the Realized One laid down training rules for his disciples.”
ai-an2:281-309.1.1_0: “For two reasons the Realized One laid down for his disciples and recited the monastic code. ...
ai-an2:281-309.1.1_1: for the recitation of the Monastic Code ...
ai-an2:281-309.1.1_2: of the cancellation of the Monastic Code ...
ai-an2:281-309.1.1_3: The invitation procedure that is laid down because of the invitation procedure ...
ai-an2:281-309.1.1_4: of the invitation procedure that is laid down from the invitation procedure,
ai-an2:281-309.1.1_5: whether a legal procedure of condemnation has been laid down,
ai-an2:281-309.1.1_6: of demotion against one who has laid down a legal procedure of demotion,
ai-an2:281-309.1.1_7: laid down a legal procedure of banishment against one deserving a procedure of banishment,
ai-an2:281-309.1.1_8: prepared a legal procedure of reconciliation against one deserving a procedure of reconciliation,
ai-an2:281-309.1.1_9: whether a procedure of ejection for not giving up a bad view,
ai-an2:281-309.1.1_10: The probation should be laid down for the probation,
ai-an2:281-309.1.1_11: he laid down the sent back to the beginning.
ai-an2:281-309.1.1_17: For a procedure that is motion,
ai-an2:281-309.1.1_18: For a procedure that requires one motion and one announcement,
ai-an2:281-309.1.1_19: due to the motion of a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements ...
ai-an2:281-309.1.1_22: It has been laid down face-to-face ...
ai-an2:281-309.1.1_25: for acting according to what has been admitted ...
ai-an2:281-309.1.1_28: Covering over as if with grass, he is wise,
ai-an2:281-309.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by two?
ai-an2:281-309.1.3_0: for the well-being of the Sangha ...
ai-an2:281-309.1.3_1: for the restraint of bad people ...
ai-an2:281-309.1.3_2: protecting against defilements that affect the present life and protecting against defilements that affect lives to come ...
ai-an2:281-309.1.3_3: leads to enmity, enmity, and ill will.
ai-an2:281-309.1.3_4: For the fault apparent in the present life, and protecting against lives to come ...
ai-an2:281-309.1.3_5: For the present life and lives to come ... For restraining threats to lives to come ...
ai-an2:281-309.1.3_6: For the restraint of unskillful qualities in this life and in lives to come ...
ai-an2:281-309.1.3_7: for householders to have wicked desires,
ai-an2:281-309.1.3_9: for the longevity of the true Teaching, and for supporting the training.
ai-an2:281-309.1.4_0: These two reasons depend on the Realized One, laid down for his disciples and lay down on the grass.”
ai-an2:281-309.1.5_0: The successive series on the Monastic Law is finished.
ai-an2:310-319.1.1_0: “For insight into greed, two things should be developed.
ai-an2:310-319.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by two?
ai-an2:310-319.1.4_0: For insight into greed, these two things should be developed.”
ai-an2:320-479.1.1_14: directly knowing and completely understanding thoughts ...
ai-an2:320-479.1.1_21: letting go of two things should be developed.
ai-an2:320-479.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by two?
ai-an2:320-479.1.4_0: For the letting go of negligence, these two things should be developed.”
ai-an2:320-479.2.1_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-an2:320-479.2.2_0: Satisfied, the mendicants were happy with what the Buddha said.
ai-an2:320-479.2.3_0: The successive permutation series on greed is finished.
ai-an2:320-479.2.4_0: The Book of the Twos is finished.
